channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: EU accused of ignoring warning signs in Broadcom's VMware acquisition
item.description: CISPE alleges that the European Commission did not properly assess VMware deal's impacts on customers.

item.title: Sharks, Snakes, and Ghosts: Space Force Unveils 7 Bizarre Themes to Name Its War Tech
item.description: Guardians will use sharks, snakes, and mythological creatures to draw inspiration for satellites and orbital warfare.

item.title: Forfaits Bouygues Telecom : voici les offres mobile et internet de l’opérateur en 2025
item.description: Bouygues Telecom fait partie des quatre grands opérateurs du marché des télécoms français. Selon les dernières études, il propose le meilleur réseau fibre, le meilleur Wi-Fi ainsi que le meilleur réseau mobile en zone urbaine. Ses offres valent-elles pour autant le coup ? Réponses ici.

item.title: Apple Is Gonna Have a Very Loaded 2026
item.description: From a foldable iPhone to a "HomePad" smart home hub, Apple has a lot of new hardware coming soon.

item.title: Ce vélo à suspension magnétique crée par un ingénieux YouTubeur est complètement fou
item.description: Très ingénieux et inspiré, le Youtubeur Colin Furze a développé un inédit vélo à suspension magnétique, dont il explique la genèse et la conception, jusqu'au premier essai. Une création étonnante, mais pas encore au point…

item.title: Arc Raiders Cold Snap update release date — Snowfall map condition, new Quests, and more
item.description: The Arc Raiders Cold Snap update arrives soon. Here's the release date, and what we know about new quests, map conditions, and more.

item.title: #FrandroidOffreMoi un aspirateur robot Ecovacs Deebot X11 OmniCyclone
item.description: Aujourd'hui, pour le 12e jour de notre calendrier de l'Avent et concours #FrandroidOffreMoi, on vous fait gagner un aspirateur robot Ecovacs Deebot X11 OmniCyclone !

item.title: The mystery behind the hellish Game Awards statue has been solved as Larian Studios unveils its next game, Divinity
item.description: Baldur's Gate 3 developer Larian Studios has announced its next major game, Divinity, at The Game Awards 2025.

item.title: Among a host of reveals, these were our favorite announcements at The Game Awards 2025
item.description: We've picked out our five favorite announcements from this year's The Game Awards, from Star Wars to Control: Resonant.

item.title: Amazon Plans to Sometimes, in Some Cases, Let You Download Your E-books Again
item.description: Maybe we can finally own the e-books we buy.

item.title: The best tech gifts and cool gadgets for 2025
item.description: Engadget staffers spend the entire year poking, prodding and otherwise testing the latest tech gadgets. So we’ve got a pretty good handle on what’s unique and interesting right now. We put together this list for anyone looking for a good gift for that tech-obsessed person on their gift list. Some of these are devices we’ve tested for our reviews and guides, others are items we bought for ourselves (or wish someone would buy for us). We’ve got more than 35 picks here, from nearly every member of the Engadget team. Chances are, you’ll find a good gift or two for every tech nerd you know. Here ar...

item.title: You’re Thinking About AI and Water All Wrong
item.description: Fears about AI data centers’ water use have exploded. Experts say the reality is far more complicated than people think.

item.title: This Samsung Odyssey OLED G5 gaming monitor just dropped to its lowest price ever, but its only available for a few more hours
item.description: As of Dec. 12, get the Samsung Odyssey G5 OLED monitor for $190 off. That brings it down to its lowest price ever, but it expires at 8 pm ET.

item.title: My mom passed away this year. Media memories help me keep her close
item.description: Commentary: The photos and voicemails you capture with loved ones will become treasures later in life.

item.title: HBO Max 2026 preview video reveals first look at new seasons of House of the Dragon, Euphoria, The Pitt, and many more new HBO TV shows
item.description: A sizzle reel for HBO Max's 2026 TV line-up has unveiled fresh footage for Lanterns, The Pitt season 2, and other new and returning shows.

item.title: Many games from The Game Awards are now on sale
item.description: Amazon is continuing to celebrate The Game Awards, which took place on December 11th, with a big sale on titles that were nominated in their respective categories. The deals include a discount that brings the PC version of Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, which ended up taking home nine awards (including game of the year), back […]

item.title: Adult sites fetish of 2026 is a 180 from last year
item.description: The adult site Clips4Sale has announced that gooning is its 2026 fetish of the year.

item.title: Long live the $749 MacBook Air deal: Save $250 on the M4 model while you can
item.description: The Apple M4 MacBook Air base model is back down to its best-ever $749 Black Friday price at both Best Buy and Amazon. Save $250 or 25%.

item.title: Workbooks integrates AI, promises empowered sales teams
item.description: Repetitive tasks can be automated, and data accuracy improved, popular CRM platform claims.

item.title: How Trump is blocking U.S. states from regulating artificial intelligence
item.description: President Trump signed an executive order that seeks to block states from creating guardrails for AI. President Donald Trump signed an executive order Thursday aimed at blocking states from crafting their own regulations for artificial intelligence, saying the burgeoning industry is at risk of being stifled by a patchwork of onerous rules while in a battle with Chinese competitors for supremacy.Members of Congress from both parties, as well as civil liberties and consumer rights groups, have pushed for more regulations on AI, saying there is not enough oversight for the powerful technology.But...

item.title: We’re still talking about the Trump phone
item.description: Every week at The Verge, we’re tracking what’s happening with Trump Mobile’s promised and yet undelivered Android phone. Why? Because we cover phones. We also cover vaporware, which the T1 Phone 8002 (gold version) very well may be. The smartphone has now been delayed for months. Trump Mobile no longer claims that it will be […]

item.title: Flaw in photo booth maker’s website exposes customers’ pictures
item.description: Hama Film makes photo booths that upload pictures and videos online. But their backend systems have a simple flaw that allows anyone to download customer pictures.

item.title: Pourquoi cette voiture électrique chinoise précipite la fin de carrière d’une Renault vendue en France
item.description: Renault vient de retirer de son catalogue l'Arkana, un SUV coupé commercialisé en 2021. Une disparition prématurée qui n'est pas due aux ventes du modèle, mais aux bouleversements stratégiques du constructeur au losange à l'autre bout du monde et à une voiture électrique chinoise en particulier : la Polestar 4. Explications.

item.title: Finally, Warhammer 40,000 gets the Total War treatment, and I can at long last build a 40K empire turn by turn
item.description: Total War: Warhammer 40,000 gets announced at The Game Awards, and it looks galactically epic.

item.title: Euphoria Season 3 gets first look in HBO Maxs 2026 trailer
item.description: A sizzle reel for HBO and HBO Max's 2026 slate showcases anticipated series like "Euphoria," "Lanterns," and "House of the Dragon."

item.title: Vous l’attendiez depuis des années : la nouvelle app Frandroid corrige son plus gros défaut
item.description: Vous nous l'avez réclamé pendant des années dans les commentaires. On vous a écoutés. La toute nouvelle application Frandroid est disponible dès maintenant. Au menu : une interface refondue, l'arrivée tant attendue sur tablettes, et une surprise de taille avec l'intégration de la recherche mais aussi de Perplexity.

item.title: Get festive with a Lego Christmas Table Decoration building set for its lowest price yet
item.description: As of Dec. 12, get a Lego Christmas Table Decoration building set for its lowest price yet.

item.title: Is the Dracula Land Theme Park for Real?
item.description: Using AI for concept art might be cheap and easy, but it doesn't instill confidence.

item.title: Meet the World Warriors of the New ‘Street Fighter’ Movie In These Wild Posters
item.description: Let's run through which actors nailed cosplaying Capcom's iconic fighters and which missed the mark entirely.

item.title: Si vous voyez ce message dans WhatsApp sur Windows 11, ce n’est pas une bonne nouvelle
item.description: Les utilisateurs de l'application WhatsApp pour Windows 11 reçoivent en ce moment un message annonçant quelque chose dont beaucoup se seraient bien passés.

item.title: Plus besoin de connaître les formules Excel pour devenir un pro du tableur avec cette nouveauté
item.description: Microsoft simplifie grandement l'utilisation de son tableur Excel par l'introduction d'une fonctionnalité très intéressante sur le papier.

item.title: The Samsung 27-inch Odyssey OLED G6 just hit a new record-low price
item.description: The world's fastest OLED monitor is $300 off at Amazon. Get it for $697.49, down from $999.99.

item.title: Pentagon launches new Gemini based AI platform
item.description: Both military and civilian personnel are getting access to GenAI.mil.

item.title: Ce laptop gaming sous RTX 5060 + Ryzen AI 5 est 450 € moins cher pendant la période de Noël
item.description: Avis aux gamers confirmés à la recherche d'un PC portable puissant taillé pour les parties nerveuses cet hiver : le HP Victus 15-fb3012nf, un modèle qui embarque le récent GPU RTX 5060, est proposé à 849,99 euros au lieu de 1 299,99 euros sur Cdiscount.

item.title: Vibe Coding: convenience, risk and the future of software development
item.description: Vibe coding can open programming to a wider audience, build tech literacy and eliminate repetitive work. But it also comes with significant risks.

item.title: Amazon UK brings back Black Friday prices for this weekend — here are the 27 best deals I'd buy
item.description: There are still dozens of top tech deals available at Amazon UK this weekend, so I've rounded up over 25 of the best offers worth buying if you're shopping for a last-minute bargain.

item.title: Apples AirTag might get improved location tracking soon
item.description: A new leak indicates that Apple is launching an improved version of AirTag soon.

item.description: As more and more age tech hits the market, I’ve been testing the most innovative gadgets for older folks and caregivers.

item.title: I quit all my AI fitness plans, and I feel free
item.description: This is Optimizer, a weekly newsletter sent every Friday from Verge senior reviewer Victoria Song that dissects and discusses the latest phones, smartwatches, apps, and other gizmos that swear they're going to change your life. Optimizer arrives in our subscribers' inboxes at 10AM ET. Opt in for Optimizer here. This time last year, I'd cut […]

item.title: World Cup soccer fans are accusing FIFA of ‘monumental betrayal.’ Here’s why
item.description: Ticket prices for this summer’s matches have begun to circulate and fans are not happy. Soccer fans have accused FIFA of a “monumental betrayal” after latest prices for World Cup tickets began to circulate on Thursday.The governing body allocates 8% of tickets to national associations for games involving their team to sell to the most loyal fans.And a list published by the German soccer federation revealed prices ranged from $180-$700 for varying group stage games. The lowest price for the final was $4,185 and the highest was $8,680.Those group-stage prices are very different from FIFA’s clai...

item.title: Russia threatens to block all Google services in a 'soft squeeze' of US tech
item.description: Russia is considering a complete ban on Google services, according to a member of the State Duma's IT committee. This comes as part of a wider crackdown on foreign technology.

item.title: Zevo wants to add robotaxis to its car-share fleet, starting with newcomer Tensor
item.description: As robotaxi adoption continues, wild ideas like personal ownership and renting them out are starting to pop up again.

item.title: Why the flash crisis will last much longer this time
item.description: The gap between SSD and HDD costs is widening with no sign of stabilization.

item.title: Here’s how Hinge is surviving the dating app apocalypse
item.description: Nobody wants to swipe anymore. Dating apps like Bumble and Tinder are scrambling to keep younger users engaged, and dealing with problems like bots on their platforms. But one brand is breaking the pattern and winning. Hinge’s “designed to be deleted” tagline signals its strategy: focus on meaningful connection, not endless swiping. The app can […] Nobody wants to swipe anymore. Dating apps like Bumble and Tinder are scrambling to keep younger users engaged, and dealing with problems like bots on their platforms. But one brand is breaking the pattern and winning....

item.title: Cette voiture électrique chinoise vendue en Europe veut supprimer l’angoisse du créneau avec cette technologie qui nous laisse perplexe
item.description: Le constructeur chinois Geely vient de dévoiler une technologie pour le moins spectaculaire : un système de roues directrices indépendantes permettant à sa voiture électrique vendue en Europe, l'EX5, de pivoter sur place. Un prototype a été présenté, mais les contraintes existent.

item.title: 18,000 Amtrak workers will get bonuses, thanks to executive cuts
item.description: Unions representing train workers praised the move. More than 18,000 Amtrak workers will receive a $900 bonus before the end of the year, the U.S. Department of Transportation announced on Thursday evening.Funding for the bonuses will come from Amtrak’s executive leadership team bonus packages, the statement said. The federal administration urged executive leadership “to forgo 50% of the bonus packages that would have been paid out under the misplaced priorities of the previous executive bonus structure.”Amtrak set all-time records for both ridership and revenue in the 2025 fiscal year, accord...
